forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Don't worry, we'll help you recover your password
forgotPassword.formSubtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you instructions to reset your password
forgotPassword.successMessage: We've sent password reset instructions to your email address. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions to reset your password.

security.title: Secure Password Reset
security.description: We take your account security seriously. Our password reset process is designed to be both secure and user-friendly.

steps.title: Simple Process
steps.description: Enter your email, receive a secure link, and follow the instructions to create a new password.

protection.title: Secure & Protected
protection.description: Your password reset link is encrypted and will expire after 24 hours for your security.

auth.passwordResetRedirect: You will be redirected to the login page in a few seconds...

security.title: Secure Password Reset
security.description: We take your account security seriously. Our password reset process is designed to be both secure and user-friendly.

secure.title: Secure Process

protection.title: Protected Account
protection.description: Your account is protected with industry-standard security measures.

errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errors.invalidPassword: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character (#?!@$%^&*-)
errors.termsRequired: You must agree to the terms and conditions
errors.serverError: An error occurred. Please try again later
